Dance of the Cloak.name: Dance of the Cloak
Dance of the Cloak.flavor: You miss with a wicked cut, and when your foe counters, you respond with a stronger attack.
Dance of the Cloak.requirement: You must be wielding a rapier or a short sword.

Crimson Rebuttal.name: Crimson Rebuttal
Crimson Rebuttal.flavor: You trick your opponent into overextending its attack and deliver a powerful blow that knocks it to the ground.
Crimson Rebuttal.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack
Crimson Rebuttal.requirement: You must be wielding a rapier or a short sword.
Crimson Rebuttal.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. You knock the target prone, and it can’t stand until the start of its next turn.

Scarlet Maneuver.name: Scarlet Maneuver
Scarlet Maneuver.flavor: You take advantage of each of your enemy’s mistakes.
Scarlet Maneuver.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack
Scarlet Maneuver.effect: You gain combat advantage against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.
